candidates.rationale: Value-led grocery and essentials mix draws trade-down shoppers; Walmart Connect offers closed-loop retail media with high ROI, positioning it to capture consolidating ad spend alongside resilient traffic.
candidates.theme: Consumer Barbell and Ad Spend Shift to Retail Media and CTV: Higher living costs and tighter credit drive trade-down at the low end while premium categories and experiences remain resilient, benefiting value retailers, club formats, off-price, and luxury; advertising dollars consolidate with platforms offering high ROI and closed-loop measurement, accelerating retail media networks, performance social, and connected TV, with positive spillovers to ad-tech and payments. (through May 2026)

candidates.rationale: Leader in off-price retail with steady branded closeout supply; offers compelling value as consumers trade down while still seeking brands, supporting traffic and share gains in a barbell consumer environment.

(through May 2026)

candidates.theme: Consumer Barbell and Ad Spend Shift to Retail Media and CTV: Higher living costs and tighter credit drive trade-down at the low end while premium categories and experiences remain resilient, benefiting value retailers, club formats, off-price, and luxury; advertising dollars consolidate with platforms offering high ROI and closed-loop measurement, accelerating retail media networks, performance social, and connected TV, with positive spillovers to ad-tech and payments. candidates.rationale: P&C insurer with underwriting discipline and pricing power in a hard market; higher yields lift investment income, and conservative leverage aligns with a higher-for-longer cost of capital.
candidates.theme: Higher-for-Longer Cost of Capital and Balance-Sheet Discipline: An elevated cost of capital versus the 2010s rewards companies with pricing power, free cash flow, and conservative leverage while pressuring long-duration and capital-intensive models; beneficiaries include insurers and brokers in hard markets, selective banks with stable deposits and fee income, cash-rich tech and industrials, and buyback or dividend growers, while overlevered CRE and rate-sensitive yield proxies remain challenged. (through May 2026)

candidates.rationale: Capital-light insurance broker with fee-based revenue that benefits from elevated premium rates; resilient cash generation and limited balance-sheet risk suit a higher cost-of-capital regime.
